revision.revremark: New file, based on ECO Diesel file + (ALM) Factoring and minor adjustments
Fixed sound selection for TSU-2200 and TSU-PNP models
Added forth compressor type to Baldwin, user reported to exist thou not in Soundtraxx doc's
Add ID CV 253,254,255,256 and change product ID to values in CV256
Change product ID to values in CVs 253(high byte) and 256(low byte)
Added Poppet Valves select and more PM to Baldwin and other decoders
Added GEVO G12 Tier 4 to GE Diesels and fix bug in poppet value cv
Separate ECO CVs file for Extended Function Map. Add labels to Extended Function map CVs.

family.name: Tsunami2 Diesel
family.comment: These are the -retail- version Econami Diesel decoders

variable.tooltip: Controls how the engine RPMs interact with the speed step setting of the throttle
variable.label: Engine Notch Rate

variable.tooltip: When this option AND manual (notching) engine control is enabled, locomotive will not move until engine starts
variable.label: Engine RPM Interlock

variable.tooltip: Determines whether prime mover will start up automatically or manually
variable.label: Engine Auto Start Enable

variable.tooltip: Controls how the dynamic brakes interact with the engine RPMs
variable.label: Dynamic Brake Override

variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use
variable.label: Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Choose an alternate airhorn or a short blast of the primary airhorn
variable.label: Auxiliary Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Bell sound effect and ring-rate
variable.label: Bell Select

variable.label: Bell Select

variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum attenuation level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under light load. (higher no. = greater attenuation)
variable.label: Prime Mover Low Volume Limit

variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum volume level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under heavy load. (higher no. = greater volume)
variable.label: Prime Mover High Volume Limit

variable.tooltip: <html>to adjust the correlation between the throttle setting and motor load sensinglt;br> sets how much the load signal is affected by the model accelerating/decelerating</html>
variable.label: Load Sensitivity

factReset.label: Reset all CVs to factory defaults
